translation.ko: 전 세상이 더 좋아질 거라고 믿어요

translation.en: and we'd be able to direct that energy
translation.ko: 그럼 거기 쏟는 에너지로 서로를 돕고

translation.en: into helping each other and doing things that matter more than that.
translation.ko: 그럼 거기 쏟는 에너지로 서로를 돕고 더 중요한 일에 쓸 수 있겠죠 "S 팩터 초급반 졸업식"

translation.en: That's the hard work that needs to be done.
[Sheila] Every woman has to take a journey into reclaiming herself…
translation.ko: 모든 여성이 자신을 되찾는 여정을 떠나야 해요

translation.en: and take back what is rightfully hers.
The biggest obstacle is the male gaze.
How do you change it?
It's a battle. It is a fight for the feminine body.
translation.ko: 이건 전투예요 여성의 몸을 위한 싸움이죠

translation.en: This is the only body we're gonna get.
We're not gonna let them own it.
We're not gonna be silent anymore.
That's what I help women do.
[judge] It is my honor and privilege
to sentence you to 175 years.
I just signed your death warrant.
[bailiff] All rise.
-[Sheila] You're, like, melting. -Isn't it amazing?
So what are you at now?
Oh, my gosh. I've lost 35 pounds.
[Sheila] Get the fuck out!
What needs to stretch?
translation.ko: "실라는 계속 수업을 한다" 뭘 뻗어야 하죠? 뭘 키워야 해요?

translation.en: What needs to grow?
translation.ko: 뭘 뻗어야 하죠? 뭘 키워야 해요? "한 번에 한 여자씩"
